info.title: Invoice Management API project
info.description: Invoice Management API project. It provides endpoints to manage users, tax profiles, and invoices. The project is structured using the MVC architecture and includes automated tests, Docker support, and API documentation via Postman.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of invoices, with the ability to filter by invoice number, date, currency, status, and notes.

parameters.name: filter[invoice_date_before]
parameters.description: Filter invoices with a date less than or equal to the specified date

parameters.name: filter[invoice_date_after]
parameters.description: Filter invoices with a date greater than or equal to the specified date

post.description: Creates a new invoice for the specified tax profile.

get.description: Returns a single invoice resource, ensuring that the invoice belongs to the specified tax profile. If the invoice does not belong to the given tax profile, a 404 error is returned.

put.description: Updates an existing invoice. The invoice is updated only if it belongs to the specified tax profile. If no changes occur, a 204 No Content is returned.

delete.description: Deletes an Invoice by their ID and returns no content.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Invoice to delete

204.description: Invoice deleted successfully, no content returned.

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of tax profiles

parameters.name: filter[tax_code]
parameters.description: Filter for partial search of tax code

parameters.name: filter[vat_number]
parameters.description: Filter for partial VAT number search

parameters.name: filter[business_name]
parameters.description: Filter for partial company name search

post.summary: Create a new user's tax profile
post.description: Creates a new tax profile associated with the specified user.

tax_code.description: Tax code (optional, must be unique with vat_number)

vat_number.description: VAT number (optional, must be unique with tax_code)

get.description: Returns a single TaxProfile by their ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the TaxProfile to retrieve

put.description: Updates the details of a TaxProfile associated with the specified user. Returns a 404 error if the TaxProfile does not belong to the user.

delete.description: Deletes a TaxProfile by their ID and returns no content.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the TaxProfile to delete

204.description: TaxProfile deleted successfully, no content returned.

get.description: Returns a paginated collection of users

post.description: Creates a new user after validating the input data and returns the created user's details.

requestBody.description: The required data for creating a new user

get.description: Returns a single user by their ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve

put.description: Updates an existing user's data. Only the provided fields will be updated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

requestBody.description: Data for updating the user. Include only the fields you wish to change.

204.description: No content, meaning no fields were changed

delete.description: Deletes a user by their ID and returns no content.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

204.description: User deleted successfully, no content returned.
